sentences.english: It's fun to feel good and fancy in your clothes.
sentences.chinese: 穿得舒心是件很開心的事。

sentences.english: Thanks for sharing the nice music!
sentences.chinese: 感覺很舒心，感謝小屹分享。

sentences.english: His spade cleaved the firm sand with a satisfying crunch.
sentences.chinese: 他的鍬鑿開了堅實的砂土，發出令人舒心的嘎扎聲。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a thin layer chromatographic(TLC)identification method of Shenqi Shuxin Capsules as the hospital preparations.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立參芪舒心膠囊的薄層色譜鑑別方法。

sentences.english: We should probably be relieved anyway.
sentences.chinese: 然而我們應該舒心一點。

sentences.english: The Spaniard's disarming humility and confidence has brought him some joy.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙人沒有防備心的性格和自信使他非常的舒心。

sentences.english: We don't have to live like monks and take a vow of poverty to live comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 我們算然不需要像僧侶一樣誓言貧窮才活的舒心。

sentences.english: May a kind of world, a reassuring touch, a warm smile be yours every day of your life.
sentences.chinese: 願寬慰善言，舒心觸撫，暖意笑容與君相隨每一天。

sentences.english: I remember this because it made me smile.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得是因爲那讓我感到舒心，我會心的笑了。

definition: at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
to cause no trouble/to be spared worry/worry-free
to feel relieved/to feel reassured/to be at ease
